title: Stream: New albums from Memoryhouse and Nite Jewel
body:
The second full length LP from [**Nite Jewel**](http://www.facebook.com/nitejewel), ‘**_One Second of Love_**’, is an album that slowly crept into my ‘I’m excited about this’ list of 2012. The track ‘**_In the Dark_**’ sparked it all; a dark and soulful jam that ended up being pleasing on the ear more than anything else, but then again, it’s pretty cool when music’s like that right? As an album, I wanted something that took a few more risks, both vocally and musically.

The album is now streaming via [Secretly Canadian](http://soundcloud.com/secretlycanadian) – hit play below and preorder [here.](http://scdistribution.com/nitejewel/)

**[Memoryhouse](http://www.facebook.com/memoryhouse)**, to me at least, are one of those groups that feel like they’ve been around for significantly longer than they actually have. The **SubPop** signed band is dropping their debut LP, ‘**_The Slideshow Effect_**’, on the February 28. If fluffy glo-fi shoe-gaze is your thing; hit play below.

The Slideshow effect drops on Feb 28 on SubPop, preorder [here.](http://www.subpop.com/releases/memoryhouse/full_lengths/the_slideshow_effect)
